channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Yup, this is Terokkar Forest with the Wizard of Oz sky.
item.content:encoded: Yup, this is Terokkar Forest with the Wizard of Oz sky.

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: Click on it a few times and it will take you to the flikr account here, which has it in many sizes. One is bound to suit your needs.
item.content:encoded: Click on it a few times and it will take you to the flikr account here, which has it in many sizes. One is bound to suit your needs.

item.title: By: Andrew Breese
item.dc:creator: Andrew Breese
item.description: Thats a great shot - is there a huge version, as I'd like to have that as a desktop background. Nicely mounted on black would be sensational (and not automatically give away that I'm a geek).
item.content:encoded: Thats a great shot – is there a huge version, as I’d like to have that as a desktop background. Nicely mounted on black would be sensational (and not automatically give away that I’m a geek).

item.title: By: HolyWarrior
item.dc:creator: HolyWarrior
item.description:
Awww, Foton, you beat me to the swirly whirlpool scresnshot!
I don't think it's the same as mine but if it is then it's not Bone Wastes.
item.content:encoded:
Awww, Foton, you beat me to the swirly whirlpool scresnshot!

I don’t think it’s the same as mine but if it is then it’s not Bone Wastes.

item.title: By: Acid
item.dc:creator: Acid
item.description: same skin as when you die and look up, but in death its black. 1st reply is right, I agree with looking up in bone wastes.
item.content:encoded: same skin as when you die and look up, but in death its black. 1st reply is right, I agree with looking up in bone wastes.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description: I was dead in the bone wastes when I looked lold'oh
item.content:encoded: I was dead in the bone wastes when I looked lold’oh

item.title: By: Adam Tiler
item.dc:creator: Adam Tiler
item.description: This is not the ghost world, which has a black hole in the middle; nor is this in Netherstorm. Look up anywhere in the Bone Wastes, Terokkar Forest, and you'll see this.
item.content:encoded: This is not the ghost world, which has a black hole in the middle; nor is this in Netherstorm. Look up anywhere in the Bone Wastes, Terokkar Forest, and you’ll see this.

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description: Looking up when you're dead, so the ghost world I guess if you want a specific 'place'.
item.content:encoded: Looking up when you’re dead, so the ghost world I guess if you want a specific ‘place’.

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description:
Terrokar, near Auch, above where you summon the skeletal dragon to fight for the quest (big kudos to the designer on this one btw).
Funny side note - if you have Witchhunter or similar running, you'll see the lightning effects are called bunnies.
item.content:encoded:
Terrokar, near Auch, above where you summon the skeletal dragon to fight for the quest (big kudos to the designer on this one btw).

Funny side note – if you have Witchhunter or similar running, you’ll see the lightning effects are called bunnies.
